amendment.description: Amendment sought to create additional exception for consent decrees or settlement agreements entered into pursuant to Meese Policy (28 C.F.R. Sec. 0.160-0.163 (2017)).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 115-363 to create additional exception for consent decrees or settlement agreements entered into pursuant to Meese Policy (28 C.F.R. Sec. 0.160-0.163 (2017)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 232 (Roll no. 587).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 232 (Roll no. 587).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
